mapper.select: select * from starrecord where owner = #{userId} order by starDateTime desc limit #{recentCnt};

select u.id as userId, u.userface as userface, u.cname as username, count(s.id) as cnt from starrecord s join (select * from user order by id) as u on u.id=s.owner group by u.id order by cnt desc limit 10;

select u.id as userId, u.userface as userface, u.cname as username, count(s.id) as cnt from user u left join (select * from starrecord where yearweek(starDateTime,1)=yearweek(curdate(),1)) s on u.id=s.owner group by u.id order by cnt desc, userId asc limit 10;
